CustomField.description: An optional, alternative / abbreviated version of the Account's name (<30 characters) used for related record (e.g., Opportunity, BU, etc.) name prefixes.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An optional, alternative / abbreviated version of the Account's name (<30 characters) used for related record (e.g., Opportunity, BU, etc.) name prefixes.
CustomField.label: Account Name (Short)
